main event: Observers reported seeing a green ball of light descending at a 40-degree angle in Los Alamos, New Mexico.
interesting points: The object left a long, unbroken green trail of the same width as itself,The sighting lasted for only one second,The object was self-luminous and did not make any sound,The observer was a Security Inspector with AESS,The weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
